product_name: Nikwax Fabric and Leather Cleaner / Waterproof Spray - Duo Pack
long_description: This Fabric and Leather Spray care kit includes a cleaning gel and waterproofing agent. It's all you need to maintain fabric and leather footwear, including hiking boots, running shoes and sandals.
short_description: This Fabric and Leather Spray care kit includes a cleaning gel and waterproofing agent. It's all you need to maintain fabric and leather footwear, including hiking boots, running shoes and sandals.
